title: Doraemon Movie 04: Nobita no Kaitei Kiganjou
synopsis: The plot revolves around a summer vacation of Nobita and his friends under the waters of Pacific Ocean. Jaian and Suneo take Doraemon's underwater vehicle and travel through the Atlantic Ocean, trying to find a treasure ship.
related_anime: ['Ninja Hattori-kun: Nin Nin Furusato Daisakusen no Maki', 'Daichouhen Doraemon', 'Perman: Birdman ga Yatte Kita!!', 'Doraemon (1979)']
